message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a chance to make a counteroffer next round.
My turn!  I'm feeling generous, but let's make a deal now before inflation eats away at our profits.
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take a smaller cut this time, but I think this is a fair deal considering the inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money by being stubborn. Take this deal and let's get out of here!
